quote: Don't be afraid to stand for what you believe in, even if that means standing alone.
author: Unknown

quote: Against the assault of laughter nothing can stand.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
author: Helen Keller

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford
